stripped_text: When the Runner accesses this asset anywhere except in R&D, you may pay X credits. The Runner must either suffer X net damage or add this asset to their score area as an agenda worth -1 agenda point.
text: When the Runner accesses this asset anywhere except in R&D, you may pay X[credit]. The Runner must either suffer X net damage or add this asset to their score area as an agenda worth -1 agenda point.
